headline: Philip Morris International Inc. (PM): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Philip Morris International Inc. on r/stocknear by realstocknear. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on PM. Philip Morris International Inc.’s share was trading at $187.00 as of February 24th. PM’s trailing and forward P/E were 23.36 and 18.83 respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
